title: Farmhouse Cookbook 3 Book Bundle: Slow Cooking, Chicken Recipes

Included In This Recipe Bundle

Easy Slow Cooking Recipes

Great recipes along with hints and tips, to be sure you get the best out of your slow cooker. Slow cooking is a fantastic way to free up time, as well as create great tasty dishes, with the minimum of effort.
